meanings.definition: Larger or greater than usual in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The elephant had an outsized body compared to the other animals.
meanings.sent2: The outsized cake was enough to feed the entire party.
meanings.sent3: The outsized umbrella was comically large for the tiny dog.
meanings.sent4: Her outsized enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The outsized mountain loomed in the distance, casting a shadow over the valley.

meanings.sent1: His outsized ego made it difficult for him to work well with others.
meanings.sent2: The outsized price of the luxury car was beyond his budget.
meanings.sent3: The outsized ice cream cone toppled over in the heat, creating a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: Her outsized collection of shoes filled up the entire closet.
meanings.sent5: The outsized waves crashed against the shore, creating a mesmerizing sight.
